meanings.definition: The state or quality of being airtight.
meanings.sent1: The airtightnesses of the jar kept the cookies fresh for a long time.
meanings.sent2: The airtightnesses of the windows prevented any cold air from entering the room.
meanings.sent3: The airtightnesses of the balloon were so good that it stayed inflated for weeks!
meanings.sent4: The airtightnesses of the relationship between the two friends ensured no secrets leaked out.
meanings.sent5: The airtightnesses of the safe made it impossible for anyone to break in.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something is airtight.
meanings.sent1: The airtightnesses of the container were tested by professionals to ensure safety.
meanings.sent2: The airtightnesses of the packaging were crucial to protect the fragile items inside.
meanings.sent3: The airtightnesses of the umbrella were so high that not a drop of rain could get through.
meanings.sent4: The airtightnesses of the plan were flawless, leaving no room for error.
meanings.sent5: The airtightnesses of the defense strategy were unmatched, securing victory for the team.
